CustomField.description: Defines how the workflow agent orchestrates its child agents. Sequential (default): executes child agents in a fixed, hardcoded order. Supervised: an LLM supervisor dynamically decides which child agents to call each round, supporting parallel fan-out/fan-in, until it returns a final response.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sequential: fixed order. Supervised: LLM supervisor routes dynamically each round.
CustomField.label: Workflow Mode
